XXsuvrnavu:210: khaḍgam gṛhāṇa rājagṛhād bahir udyānaṃ gamiṣyāmi tatrāsti me kiñcid ātyayikaṃ prayojanam ity evaṃ svāminn iti sa puruṣaḥ khaḍgam ādāya tasya pṛṣṭhato 'nubaddhas
XXsuvrnavu:211: tataḥ pracaṇḍo 'mātyas tena puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ rājagrān nirgatya divākarasya
XXsuvrnavu:214: [17] kāśisundary api dārikā vicitravastrālaṅkārālaṅkṛtaśarīrā rājagṛān nāgarān nirgatya divākarasya sārthavāhasyodyānaṅ gatā |
XXsuvrnavu:215: sā tatra praviṣṭā yāvat paśyati pracaṇḍam amātyaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ saṃtrastā |
XXsuvrnavu:216: saṃlakṣayaty eṣa prakṛtyaiva pracaṇḍo niyataṃ me 'dya mahāntam anarthaṅ karotīti
XXsuvrnavu:218: tataḥ pracaṇḍo 'mātyas tāṃ dṛṣṭvā krodhāgnijvalitamanās triśikhāṃ lalāṭe bhṛkurṭiṃ kṛtvā pradhāvitas tatas tāṃ sarabhasaṃ keśeṣu gṛhītvā nirdayam avāṅmukhīṃ pṛthivyāṃ pātayitvā
XXsuvrnavu:219: samākṛṣṭavān evañ cāha tvam ihāgatya suvarṇavarṇena kumāreṇa sārddhaṃ paricārayasi |
XXsuvrnavu:223: tad adya te tādṛśam maryādābandhāṃ karomi yena punar na bhavatī jīvalokaṃ drakṣyati |
XXsuvrnavu:225: tac chrutvā kāśisundarī dārikā tadākarṣaṇaparākarṣaṇajaṃ duḥkham agaṇayitvā maraṇabhayabhītā bāṣpoparuddhyamānagadagadakaṇṭhī hā idānīn na bhaviṣyāmīti |
XXsuvrnavu:226: kampamānagātrī pracaṇḍasyāmātyasya pādayor nipatya karuṇadīnavilamvitair akṣarair uvāca prasīdatv āryaputro nārhasi māṃ praghātayitum iti nityāparādho mātṛgrāmaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:227: itaḥ prabhṛti na bhūya evaṅ kariṣyāmi |
XXsuvrnavu:229: tad alam anena sāhasena prayaccha jīvitam iti |
XXsuvrnavu:230: tasya durātmana evaṃ karuṇadīnavilamvitair akṣarair ucyamānasya krodhāgnir vardhata eva |
XXsuvrnavu:231: tatas taṃ sahāyakam uvāca śīghram asyā anena khaḍgenotkṛttamūlaṃ śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyān nipātayety
XXsuvrnavu:233: [18] atha sa puruṣas tasya durātmano 'nyāyavaco duraktam upaśrutya kampitum ārabdhaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:235: aho nairghṛṇyam eṣā hi strī bahuprakāram asyopayuktā |
XXsuvrnavu:236: tat kathan nāma svalpasyāparādhasyārthe praghātayitum icchati |
XXsuvrnavu:237: aho vayam api jīvikābhayabhītā yena nāmāsyāśīviṣaprakhyasya puruṣādhamasya pārṣve tiṣṭhāmaḥ
XXsuvrnavu:239: kim atra prāptakālaṃ atha vā sphuṭam enaṃ vakṣyāmi kadācid eva sphuṭam ucyamānaḥ pratinivartetāsmāt pāpakād asaddharmād iti |
XXsuvrnavu:240: viditvā samvignamanās tasyāś ca striyās tair atikaruṇair vilāpair dravīkṛtasantāno bāṣpāmbupariplutaq_īkṣaṇaḥ kṛtakarapuṭaḥ pracaṇḍam amātyam uvāca |
XXsuvrnavu:242: niyojayitun nāhaṃ niṣādo nāpi vadhyaghātakaḥ kathaṃ hi nāma yat karmma vadhyaghātakānām api notsahate manas tatkarmaṇi pratārayati māṃ svāmī |
XXsuvrnavu:243: eṣā ca strī prakāśātyartham abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sarvakalābhijñā rājagṛhanivāsino nānādigdeśābhyāgatasya ca vidagdhajanasyātīva vallabhā |
XXsuvrnavu:245: kathaṃ hi nāma svāmin prajñātamanuṣyasya vicakṣaṇasyāsminn anunayasthāne dveṣa utpannas tad alam īdṛśena lokadvayavirudhāvāhakena vyavasāyena |
XXsuvrnavu:246: prasīda nārhasi mām ātmanañ cānena duścaritāgninā dagdhum |
XXsuvrnavu:249: prītim etām manuṣyāṇāṃ manye mārtimatīm iva |1|
XXsuvrnavu:250: karuṇaiḥ karuṇair dīnair madhurair akṣarair iyaṃ |
XXsuvrnavu:251: vijñapayati svāmiṃs te dṛṇāti mama mānasaṃ |2|
XXsuvrnavu:252: kampate hṛdayam me 'dya śrutvā dīptaṃ vacas tava |
XXsuvrnavu:253: ko 'sau nirghṛṇacittaḥ syād ya imāṃ hantum edhate |3|
XXsuvrnavu:254: mlecchā api naināṃ hantum utsahante sunirghṛṇāḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:255: kathan nu mama tāṃ hantuṃ svāmin utsahate manaḥ |4|
XXsuvrnavu:256: paśūnām api yāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhavaty anunayo mahān |
XXsuvrnavu:257: tasyāḥ ko manuṣyo bhūtvā śastreṇa prahariṣyati |5|
XXsuvrnavu:258: tat prasīda tavāyuktam api śrotum idam vacaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:259: prāg eva acarituṃ svāmin karmmedam atidāruṇam iti |6|
XXsuvrnavu:261: [19] atha sa durātmā vipannāśayatvād evam api hṛdayagrāhakair vacobhis tena puruṣeṇābhidhiyamāno naiva svacittaṃ pratilabhate ||
XXsuvrnavu:262: saroṣabhrūlatābhaṅgaraudreṇa ca mukhena taṃ puruṣam uvāca || bhoḥ puruṣa kas tavāsyāṃ upary anunayo yan nāma madīyām ājñāṃ vilaṅghya necchasy enāṃ praghātayituṃ sarvathā yadi tvam enāṃ praghātayiṣyasīty evaṃ kuśalan no
XXsuvrnavu:263: cen na praghātayiṣyasi tavādya jīvitaṃ ca bhaviṣyatīti |
XXsuvrnavu:264: tato 'sau puruṣas tasya tat karkaśaṃ vyavasāyaṃ buddhvā bhītaś cintayituṃ pravṛttaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:266: sa ced asyājñāṃ na kariṣyāmi niyatam adya māṃ jīvitād vyaparopayiṣyati |
XXsuvrnavu:267: yo hi nāmaivaṃvidhiṃ mātṛgrāmaṃ bahuprakāram upayuktaṃ praghātayitum udyataḥ sa māṃ na praghātayiṣyatīti
XXsuvrnavu:268: kuta etat kathañ ca nāma manuṣyo 'ham ity ātmānam manye |
XXsuvrnavu:269: īdṛśyā janapadakalyāṇinyāḥ striyāḥ śarīre śastraṃ nipātayiṣyāmi |
XXsuvrnavu:270: sarvathā kāmaṃ svajīvitavināśo na tv evāsyāḥ prahāraṃ dāsyāmīti niścayaṃ kṛtavāṃs tasya buddhir utpannā yady ahaṃ khaḍgam ādāya niṣpalāyeyaṃ evaṃ mayā tv ātmā parirakṣito bhaviṣyati |
XXsuvrnavu:272: sa khaḍgam ādāya tasmād udyānād niṣkramya sarvajavena niḥpalānaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:273: pracaṇḍo py amātyas tasya pṛṣṭhato dvārakoṣṭhaṃ yāvad anubaddhaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:275: [20] tataḥ kāśisundarī dārikā gatapratyāgataprāṇam ivātmānam manyamano
XXsuvrnavu:277: sā coccaḥ prākāraṃ na śaknoti vilaṅghayituṃ |
XXsuvrnavu:278: pracaṇḍaś cāmātyaḥ pratinivṛtya yāvat tasmin pradeśe kāśisundarīṃ dārikān na paśyati |
XXsuvrnavu:279: itaś cāmutaś ca vyavalokayitum ārabdho yāvat paśyati prākārasamīpam abhigatāṃ sa tvaritatvaritaṃ tasyāḥ samīpaṃ gantum ārabdhaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:282: tena sā dakṣiṇe caraṇe daṣṭā sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā niṣpalānaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:284: eṣaḥ ca pracaṇḍo mām āgatya praghātayiṣyatīti |
XXsuvrnavu:288: tatas tena durātmanā nirghṛṇahṛdayena tīvradveṣaparyākulīkṛtamanasā kāśisundarīṃ dārikāṃ tasmād atimuktakalatāgahanād ākṛṣya tasyāḥ śirasi pārṣṇiprahāro dattaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:289: sukumārā sā strī tena prahāreṇa viṣavegena ca mūrcchitā pracaṇḍo 'py amātyas tān nirīkṣitum ārabdho yāvat paśyati niśceṣṭāṃ bhūmau nipatitāṃ tasyaitad abhavan mṛteyam idānīṃ gacchāmīti tataś ca māṃ mā kaścid drakṣyatīti |
XXsuvrnavu:295: [21] suvarṇavarṇaś ca kumāro rājagṛhān niṣkramya svam udyānam anuprāptaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:296: yāvat paśyati kāśisundarīṃ dārikām itaś cāmutaś ca samāhṛṣṭāṃ muktakeśīṃ niśceṣṭāṃ bhūmau nipatitāṃ dṛṣṭvā cāsya mahāsamvega utpannaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:297: tenopalakṣitaṃ kenāpy eṣā durātmanā nirghṛṇahṛdayena tyaktaparalokena vairānubaddhenāhānīya praghātitā bhaviṣyati |
XXsuvrnavu:298: dhik kaṣṭam īdṛśā api nāma sattvā bhavanti |
XXsuvrnavu:300: tena tad udyānaṃ sarvaṃ pratyavekṣitaṃ yāvan na kiñcit paśyati tasyaiva tad abhavad eṣā strī prajñātā 'sminn udyāne praghātitā |
XXsuvrnavu:302: sarvathā durātmanā kenāpi svadaurātmyam antargataṃ prakaṭīkurvatā mana mastake 'yaśo 'śanir nipātita iti |
XXsuvrnavu:303: sa caivaṃ samvignamanāḥ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyasthitaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:306: praviśya ca tad udyānaṃ pratyavekṣitum ārabdhāḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:307: yāvat paśyanti kāśisundarīṃ dārikām itaś cāmutaś ca samāhṛṣṭāṃ muktakeśīṃ niśceṣṭāṃ bhūmau nipatitāṃ |
XXsuvrnavu:308: dṛṣṭvā suvarṇavarṇasya kumārasya pūrvakarmavipākasāmarthyān na tāṃ kaścit paricchinatti |
XXsuvrnavu:314: suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāraṃ muktvā na kañcid anyaṃ paśyanti |
XXsuvrnavu:317: sa kathayati bhavanto 'ham api na jāne mayāpy eṣā eva dṛṣṭeti |
XXsuvrnavu:319: [23] atha te rājapuruṣāḥ parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:320: bhavanta eṣa kumāro 'tyantavinīto nāsyedaṃ karma saṃbhāvyate |
XXsuvrnavu:321: atra ca na kañcid anyaṃ paśyāmaḥ sarvathā paramasaṅkaṭam anupraviṣṭāḥ smaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:325: etāṃ striyaṃ kumārañ ca karaṇamaṇḍapaṃ nayāmas tatrāmātyā eva paricchetsyantīti |
XXsuvrnavu:326: tatas te rājapuruṣās tāṃ striyaṃ śivikām āropya suvarṇavarṇañ ca kumāram ādāya karaṇamaṇḍapaṅ gatās tatra ca karaṇamaṇḍape pracaṇḍo 'mātyaḥ pratipattyaivānukūlair vyavahāribhiḥ sārddhaṃ sanniṣaṇṇo
XXsuvrnavu:328: sannipatito yadbhūyasā tān eva rājapuruṣān āgamayamānas tena te dūrata eva dṛṣṭāḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:329: pṛṣṭāś ca bhavantaḥ kim idam iti |
XXsuvrnavu:330: tair ākhyātam eṣāsmābhiḥ strī divārakasya sārthavāhasyodyāne kālagatā dṛṣṭā tañ codyānam asmābhiḥ pratyavekṣitatam |
XXsuvrnavu:331: suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāraṃ muktvā na kañcid anyaṃ paśyāmaḥ eṣa cāsmābhiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ kumāraḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:333: anenākhyātam aham api bhavanto na jāne mayāpy eṣā evam eva dṛṣṭeti |
XXsuvrnavu:334: tad idānīṃ svāmina evaṃ pravicārayantv iti |
XXsuvrnavu:337: bhavanto mūhūrtaṃ tāvad avīkṣadhvaṃ yāvad ahaṃ rājño nivedayāmīti |
XXsuvrnavu:338: tena rājño 'jātaśatror gṛhaṃ gatvā daurvārikaḥ puruṣaḥ pṛṣṭo bhoḥ puruṣadevaḥ kiṃ karotīti
XXsuvrnavu:339: tenākhyātam upariprāsādatalagato niḥpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
XXsuvrnavu:340: labdhapraṇayo 'sau tena pratihārī preṣitā gaccha devasya nivedayāmātyā
XXsuvrnavu:342: divākarasya sārthavāhasya putreṇodyāne kāśisundarī dārikā praghātitā |
XXsuvrnavu:345: tayā gatvā rājño niveditaṃ rājā tatra ratikrīḍāyām atīva śaktaḥ kathayati |
XXsuvrnavu:346: gacchāmātyān evam vada yūyam evaṃ nipuṇaṃ pravicārayadhvam iti |
XXsuvrnavu:347: tayā nirgatya pracaṇḍasyāmātyasya niveditam evaṃ devaḥ samājñāpayatīti |
XXsuvrnavu:349: [25] tataḥ pracaṇḍo 'mātyaḥ karaṇamaṇḍapam āgatya tān rājapuruṣān uvāca |
XXsuvrnavu:355: gacchatainaṃ durācāraṃ paścād bāhubandhanaṃ gāḍhaṃ kṛtvā kharasvareṇa paṭena vādyamānena rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu śravaṇamukheṣv anuśrāvya dakṣiṇena nagaradvāreṇa nirṇamayya mahāśmaśān
XXsuvrnavu:356: nītvā śūle samāropayata mṛtañ cainaṃ kāśisundaryā dārikayā sahaikāñ citām āropya dhyāpayateti
XXsuvrnavu:357: atha te vadhyaghātakāḥ suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāram atyartham abhirūpam uttaptasuvarṇaparvvataśṛṅgam iva paramayā śriyā jvalantam udvīkṣya samvignāḥ parasparam ūcuḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:358: bhavantaḥ kiñcāpi vayam vadhyaghātakās tat katham īdṛśamatidurllabhadarśanaṃ puruṣaviśeṣaṃ praghātayiṣyāmaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:359: sarvathā kāmam asmākaṃ svajīvitavināśo na tv evainaṃ praghātayiṣyāmaḥ iti |
XXsuvrnavu:361: [26] pracaṇḍo 'mātyas tān parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kurvāṇāṅ dṛṣṭvā pṛcchati |
XXsuvrnavu:366: kiñcāpi vayam vadhyaghātakā api notsahāmahe īdṛśaṃ puruṣaviśeṣaṃ mahājanavallabhaṃ praghātayitum iti |
XXsuvrnavu:368: bhavanto yadi yūyam enaṃ na praghātayiṣyatha |
XXsuvrnavu:369: yuṣmākam evādya saputrakalatrabāndhavānāṃ jīvitāni na bhaviṣyantīti |
XXsuvrnavu:373: yo hi nāma suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāram evam atidurlabhadarśanaṃ puruṣaviśeṣaṃ parityaktum udyataḥ yo 'smān
XXsuvrnavu:379: eṣā kumāro mahājanavallbhas tad enan tāvad vīthīm avatarāmaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:380: sthānam etad vidyate yan mahājanakāya evainaṃ pratimocayiṣyati |
XXsuvrnavu:381: ko hy enaṃ praghātyamānam upekṣituṃ samartha iti |
XXsuvrnavu:384: tañ ca tathā rūpaudāryasampadā vibhrājamānam ālokya na śaknuvanti spraṣṭuṃ tato vepamānāṅgapratyaṅgā bāṣpoparudhyamānagadgadakaṇṭhāḥ kranditum ārabdhāḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:385: hā kaṣṭam īdṛśā api vayaṃ pāpakarmakāriṇo yenaivamvidhe kārye niyojyāmahe iti |
XXsuvrnavu:387: [27] tataḥ pracaṇḍenāmātyena bhūyaḥ sakarkaśam ājñaptāḥ kim
XXsuvrnavu:390: tair asau bāṣpāmbupariplutekṣaṇair vepamānair gṛhītas tenaiva suvarṇapītena vastreṇa paścād bāhuko baddhaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:391: tañ ca paścād bāhugāḍhabandhanabaddham ālokya pracaṇḍam amātyaṃ muktvā sarva eva karaṇamaṇḍapastho janakāyas tadviyogamanyudravīkṛtasantāno 'śrūṇi prapātayitum ārabdho hā kaṣṭam idānīm eva durlabhadarśanaḥ kumāro na bhaviṣyatīti |
XXsuvrnavu:392: tatas tair vadhyaghātakair vīthyām avatārito yathāsminn antare kolāhalo jātas tañ ca kolāhalam upaśrutya sastrīpuruṣadārakadārikā rājagṛhanivāsīnānādigdeśābhyāgataś ca janakāyaḥ sannipatitaḥ suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāraṃ paścād bāhugāḍhabandhanabaddham ālokya samvignamanāḥ sasambhramaṃ praṣṭum ārabdha |
XXsuvrnavu:394: tatas te vadhyaghātakāḥ bāṣpoparudhyamānagadgadakaṇṭhāḥ krandanta ūcuḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:396: 'nena kumāreṇa kila kāśisundarī dārikā praghātiteti vadhāya parityakto rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣv anuśrāvyate |
XXsuvrnavu:397: na cirād eva mahāśmaśānaṃ nītvā praghātyata iti |
XXsuvrnavu:399: [28] tac chrutvā sa mahājanakāyas tadviyogaduḥkhābhyāhata ekaraveṇoccair
XXsuvrnavu:401: hā hā katham ayaṃ kumāra evamabhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopeta uttaptasuvarṇavarṇayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ sarvajanamanonayanaharaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:402: paṇḍito vinītaḥ peśalo dakṣaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmmakāmaḥ sattvavatsalaḥ praghātyate |
XXsuvrnavu:403: kim astaṅgatāḥ sādhavaḥ kim antarhito dharmaḥ kim adharmasyaiva niḥsapatnaṃ rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ |
XXsuvrnavu:406: dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā yam asmākaṃ parā prītir abhūt purā |1|
XXsuvrnavu:407: tam enaṃ sāmprataṃ dṛṣṭvā vadhyaghātair adhiṣṭhitaṃ |
XXsuvrnavu:410: tasyopari kathan nāma rājñā daṇḍo nipātyate |3|
XXsuvrnavu:411: nirīkṣamāṇā yan nityaṃ tṛptin nāyānti dehinaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:412: vadhāya sa kathaṃ tyakto ghṛṇā tyaktādya mantribhiḥ |4|
XXsuvrnavu:413: cāritryaṃ vinayopetaṃ yasya khyātaṃ muner iva |
XXsuvrnavu:414: kathaṃ saṃbhāvyate tasya hy aparādho 'yam īdṛśaḥ |5|
XXsuvrnavu:415: adharmo vata jāgarti dharmaḥ supto 'tha vā mṛtaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:416: yad evaṃ guṇino 'py asya viyogo 'yam upasthitaḥ |6|
XXsuvrnavu:418: [29] sa ca strīṇāṃ atīva priyas tatra kāścit striyas tadviyogaduḥkhābhyāhatāḥ pṛthivyām āvartanaparivartanaṃ kurvanti |
XXsuvrnavu:421: ekaikās tatra putraviyogasadṛśaṃ viyogaduḥkham anubhavanti sma |
XXsuvrnavu:423: mahātmā rājagṛhanagaranivāsī janakāyo yadbhūyasā tadviyogaduḥkhābhyāhato vikroṣṭum ārabdhaḥ
XXsuvrnavu:427: [30] divākarasya sārthavāhasya gṛhād dārikā vīthīm avatīrṇā |
XXsuvrnavu:428: tayā eṣa vṛttāntaḥ śrutas tataḥ krandamānā uras tāḍayantī tvaritatvaritaṃ gṛhaṃ gatvā yena suvarṇavarṇasya kumārasya mātā tenopasaṃkrāntā upasaṃkramya tasyāḥ purata ātmānaṃ kṣiptavatī tataḥ suvarṇavarṇasya kumārasya mātā saṃtrastā pṛcchati |
XXsuvrnavu:431: ārye suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāraḥ paścād bāhugāḍhabandhanabaddho vadhyaghātakair adhiṣṭhito 'nena kilodyāne kāśisundarī dārikā praghātitety avicāryaiva vadhāya parityakto rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣv anuśrāvyate |
XXsuvrnavu:432: na cirād eva mahāśmaśānaṃ nītvā praghātyata iti |
XXsuvrnavu:434: [31] tac chrutvā suvarṇavarṇasya kumārasya mātā tīvraduḥkhābhyāhatā
XXsuvrnavu:436: tato jalābhiṣekapratyāgataprāṇā utthāya hā putra hā putreti vikrośantī keśā luñcamānā uras tāḍayantī kampamānā muhur muhur moham upagacchantī gṛhān nirgatya vīthīm avatīrṇā |
XXsuvrnavu:437: sā putraviyogaśokābhyāhatā viklavahṛdayā tattad vilapantī ekaikaṃ pṛcchati |
XXsuvrnavu:438: katareṇa pathā suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāro nīto bhaviṣyatīti |
XXsuvrnavu:439: hā putrakaṃ na paśyāmi paritrāyadhvaṃ paritrāyadhvaṃ putrakam me darśayateti |
XXsuvrnavu:442: [32] yathā yathā sārthavāhapatnī suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāran na paśyati |
XXsuvrnavu:443: tathā tathā tīvrataraśokaduḥkhābhyāhatā uccair vikrośantī ekaikasya pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭī vijñāpayati |
XXsuvrnavu:444: paritrāyadhvaṃ paritrāyadhvam me śīghram avakāśam anuprayacchata yāvat kumāro nātikramyate anena pathā |
XXsuvrnavu:445: anena pathā putrako me suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāro nīyate yathā ca taṃ paśyāmi tathā me prasādaṃ kartum arhatheti |
XXsuvrnavu:446: sā ca tatrāvakāśam alabhamānā hā kathaṃ bhoḥ putra na labha iti |
XXsuvrnavu:448: | tato jaloddhṛteva matsī pṛthivyām āvarttanaparivartanaṅ kartum ārabdhā |
XXsuvrnavu:463: hā paṇḍita vinīta viśārada manojña dakṣa |
XXsuvrnavu:473: hā katham avicāryaivam anātho vadhāya nīyate sa iti |
XXsuvrnavu:475: [33] punar api ca kṛtakarapuṭā paurān vijñapayantī |
XXsuvrnavu:477: hā hatāsmi nirānandā kim idaṃ vartate mama |
XXsuvrnavu:478: svapno 'yam atha vā moha āhosvic cittavibhramaḥ |1|
XXsuvrnavu:480: paurān vijñāpayām āsa viruvantī muhur muhuḥ |2|
XXsuvrnavu:481: avinīto virūpo vā na ca me hṛdayapriyaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:482: yad evam adhyupekṣadhvaṃ nīyamānaṃ sutam mama |3|
XXsuvrnavu:483: anukampā sa ced asti pakṣapāto guṇeṣu vā |
XXsuvrnavu:484: tathā me kriyatāṃ paurā yathā paśyāmi putrakaṃ |4|
XXsuvrnavu:488: na viśrabdha pariṣvakto bahuśo nāpi cumbitaḥ |6|
XXsuvrnavu:490: evam eva kathan nāma nīyate bhoḥ suto mama |7|
XXsuvrnavu:491: śūnyā me 'dya diśaḥ sarvā vepate me kaḍevaraṃ |
XXsuvrnavu:492: dahyate hṛdayañ cāpi moham eti ca mānasaṃ |8|
XXsuvrnavu:494: hā hā na bhūyo drakṣyāmi sutaṃ hṛdayavallabhaṃ |9|
XXsuvrnavu:495: nūnaṃ kṛtan mayā pāpam anyajanmani dāruṇaṃ |
XXsuvrnavu:497: yena satyena cittam me śatruṣv api na pāpakaṃ |
XXsuvrnavu:498: mucyatāṃ vyasanād asmāt tena satyena me suta iti |11|
XXsuvrnavu:500: [34] divākaraś ca sārthavāhaḥ samudrāt saṃsiddhayānpātro rājagṛham
XXsuvrnavu:502: sa rājagṛhan nagaraṃ praviśan nimittāny apraśastāni paśyati |
XXsuvrnavu:503: tasya hṛdayaṃ kampitum ārabdhaṃ aṅgāni sīditum ārabdhāni |
XXsuvrnavu:504: netraṃ sphuritum ārabdhaṃ śakunayaś cāsya purataḥ kharam vāśitum ārabdhāḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:505: sa nimittakuśalaḥ śakunirute ca kṛtavī cintayituṃ pravṛttaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:506: yathaitāni nimittāny apraśastāni samanupaśyāmi dhruvam adya suvarṇavarṇasya kumārasya mahān upadravaḥ samupasthito bhaviṣyati |
XXsuvrnavu:507: tathā hy etāni nimittāni tadviyogaṃ sūcayantīty āha ca |
XXsuvrnavu:508: yathā sphurati netram me yathā rauti vihaṅgamaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:510: yathā cāṅgāni sīdanti vepate hṛdayañ ca me |
XXsuvrnavu:514: vepathur apragalbhapadasañcāraḥ kathañcid rājagṛham anupraviṣṭo yāvac chṛṇoti mahājanakāyasya krandanaśabdaṃ |
XXsuvrnavu:515: sa tam ākrandanaśabdam anusaran vīthīm avatīrṇo yāvat paśyati mahājanakāyaṃ rākṣasopadrutam iva nagaraṃ viyogaduḥkhābhyāhataṃ krandamānaṃ tena sammukhāgato 'nyatamaḥ puruṣaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:517: sa ca tan na jānāti yathāyam evāsau divākaraḥ sārthavāha iti |
XXsuvrnavu:518: tenākhyātaṃ divākarasya sārthavāhasya putraḥ suvarṇavarṇo nāma kumāro 'tyantaṃ rūpādiguṇasampadā yuktas tena kilodyāne kāśisundarī dārikā praghātitety avicāryaiva vadhāya parityakto rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣv aṇuśrāvyate |
XXsuvrnavu:519: na cirād eva mahāśmaśānaṃ nītvā praghātyata iti |
XXsuvrnavu:520: tac chrutvā divākaraḥ sārthavāhaḥ putraviyogaduḥkhābhyāhataḥ sahasaiva mūrcchito bhūmau nipatitaḥ
XXsuvrnavu:521: tato jalābhiṣekapratyāgataprāṇa utthāya bāṣpormitaraṅgāpūryamāṇavadanakamalaḥ sambhrāntaḥ sa nirīkṣamāṇa hā katareṇa pathā suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāro nīto bhaviṣyatīti |
XXsuvrnavu:523: yāvat paśyati tāvat paśyati bhāryāṃ muktakeśīm ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyām uras tāḍayantīṃ ārtasvaraṃ tat tadvilapantīṃ sutaviyogajāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanaāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punas
XXsuvrnavu:526: [36] sā taṃ dṛṣṭvā dviguṇataraśokaśalyābhyāhata bāṣpormmitaraṅgāpūryamāṇavadanakamalā sasambhramā tvaritaṃ tvaritam utthāya tasya purata ātmānaṃ kṣiptavatī |
XXsuvrnavu:527: sā tato divākareṇa sārthavāhenārtasvaraṃ krandamānā pariṣvajyotthāpitā |
XXsuvrnavu:529: sārthavāhaṃ paritrāyasva paritrāyasva putrabhikṣām me 'nuprayacchety āha ca |
XXsuvrnavu:532: yasya janmani te svāmin ānandaaḥ paramo 'bhavat |
XXsuvrnavu:533: sa eva māraṇāyādya nīyate vallabhaḥ sutaḥ |2|
XXsuvrnavu:540: sarvam etad dhi kriyate etac cakṣur nirudhyate |
XXsuvrnavu:542: tac chīghraṃ kriyatāṃ yatna[ḥ] sutasya parimuktaye |
XXsuvrnavu:543: sarvasvam api dattvādya putraṃ māñ ca vimocaya |7|
XXsuvrnavu:544: ṛdhyantu tava saṅkalpā ṛdhyatv āśāsitum manaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:545: apy eva tañ ca jīvantaṃ drakṣyāmi tava putrakam iti |8|
XXsuvrnavu:547: [37] atha divākaraḥ sārthavāhaḥ putraviyogaśokaduḥkhābhyāhato 'pi dhairyam avalaṃbya cittena kṛtakarapuṭaḥ paurān uvāca || bhoḥ bhoḥ paurāḥ śrūyatāṃ kathan nāma yuktaṃ bhavatāmamedaṃ vyasanam upasthitam upekṣituṃ |
XXsuvrnavu:548: katham aṭavyām ivāvicārya nagaramadhyena yuṣmākaṃ paśyatām eva prakāśaguṇo 'pi me kumāro vadhāya nīyate |
XXsuvrnavu:551: kathaṃ kumārasya muktaye na prayatnadhvam iti |
XXsuvrnavu:552: te kathayanti sārthavāha īdṛśo 'yaṃ kumāro guṇavāṃs tavaivaiaksyedaṃ
XXsuvrnavu:553: vyasanam api tu sarveṣām evāsmākaṃ kin tūpāyan na paśyāmaḥ kumārasya pratimuktaye |
XXsuvrnavu:556: bhavantaḥ parijñāta eva yuṣmābhir ayaṃ kumāro yathātyantaṃ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ sattvavatsalaḥ
XXsuvrnavu:560: yadi kumāraḥ pravicāryate niyatam asmād vyasanāt parimucyate |
XXsuvrnavu:561: yūyañ ca sādhavaḥ sarvajanasādhāraṇās tad yuṣmākaṃ vijñāpayatāṃ na kaścid doṣo dṛśyate |
XXsuvrnavu:564: yat kāruṇyacittaṃ paryupasthāpya gatvā rājā vijñapyatāṃ |
XXsuvrnavu:565: tanmantriṇo vā kadācic ca te 'rtharucitvāt suyuktam api yuṣmadvacanam anyathā na manayanti
XXsuvrnavu:567: tataḥ sarvasvam api madīyaṃ dattvā tathā prasādaḥ karaṇīyo yathā kumāraḥ pravicāryata iti
XXsuvrnavu:570: teṣu vacanāt kumāraguṇānurāgāc cābhyupagataṃ tataḥ taiḥ pravīṇā vyavahāriṇaḥ paurikā rājakulaṃ preṣitā uktāś ca |
XXsuvrnavu:571: sa ced adya kumāraḥ punar nipuṇataraṃ pravicāryate vayam api rājñaḥ suvarṇalakṣam anuprayacchāma iti |
XXsuvrnavu:572: tatas te paurikā vyavahāriṇaḥ karaṇamaṇḍapaṅgatāḥ pracaṇḍena cāmātyena dūrata eva dṛṣṭā uktāś ca bhavantaḥ kim āgamanaprayojanam iti |
XXsuvrnavu:573: tair ākhyātaṃ rājagṛhanivāsinaś ca paurā evaṃ vijñapayanty ayaṃ suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāro 'tyarthaṃ rūpaudāryasampadā yuktatvān mahājanavallabhaś ced asya viyogād
XXsuvrnavu:575: dharmābhiratatvād vinayādiguṇopetatvāc cāsya na kaścid enam aparādham abhiśraddadhāti |
XXsuvrnavu:577: divākaraś ca sārthavāhaḥ sarvasvam asmadvijñaptyā suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāraḥ pratinivartya punar nipuṇataraṃ pravicāryatām evaṃ kṛte cāsmākaṃ vijñāptisākalyaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati |
XXsuvrnavu:581: bhavantaḥ kim atra na vicāritaṃ yad bhūyo vicāryate yac ca kathayata rājakośa eṣa saṃvarddhito bhavatīti |
XXsuvrnavu:582: tata kiṃ vayam anyāyopāttair dravyai rājakośaṃ samvarddhayiṣyāmaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:584: sarvathā yūyam avaśyaṃ vaiśālakānāṃ prayogeṇāsya rājño 'narthaṅ karttukāmā yenaivam upāyenāsya rājño 'varṇaṃ niścārayitum icchatha |
XXsuvrnavu:585: anyāyakāry eva rājā yad evam avicāryaṃ janapadaṃ vināśayatīti |
XXsuvrnavu:587: sa tān nirbhartsayitvā catvāro 'sya kṛtāntapuruṣasadṛśāḥ santi manuṣyā
XXsuvrnavu:588: atiraudrakarmāṇaḥ satatābhyāsavaśān nirghṛṇīkṛtasantānā niṣkaruṇās tān āhūya kathayati |
XXsuvrnavu:590: asmādvacanācca vaktavyā śīghram enaṃ nagarān niṣkāsya yathā sandiṣṭena vidhinā praghātayata
XXsuvrnavu:591: na ca yuṣmābhir māṃ muktvā rājānam vānayasya kasyacid vacanenāyaṃ moktavyaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:594: evaṃ svāminn iti te rājapuruṣās tasya pratiśrutya khaḍgapāṇayaḥ saṃprasthitās |
XXsuvrnavu:596: [40] te vadhyaghātakā vyākṣepaśatāni kurvāṇāḥ śainaḥ śainaḥ suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāraṃ rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣv anuśrāvayantaḥ paribhrāmayanto 'ho
XXsuvrnavu:597: vata kumārasya kecit mocayitāro bhaviṣyanty apy evaṃ vayam īdṛśam akāryaṃ na kurma iti |
XXsuvrnavu:598: te rājapuruṣā nikṛṣṭakhaḍgapāṇayas samprāptā tais teṣām vadhyaghātakānāṃ yathā sandiṣṭam ākhyātaṃ
XXsuvrnavu:599: uktāś ca yady enaṃ śīghraṃ nagarān niṣkrāmya yathā sandiṣṭena vidhinā na praghātayata |
XXsuvrnavu:600: vayaṃ yuṣmān sāmpratam eva praghātayāma iti |
XXsuvrnavu:601: te tān atisekanikṛṣṭān khaḍgavyagraṣṭān yamapuruṣān ivālokya saṃtrastās tato maraṇabhayabhītāś cintayituṃ pravṛttāḥ hā kaṣṭaṃ na kenacit kumārasya paritrāṇaṃ kṛtaṃ |
XXsuvrnavu:603: bāṣpāmbupariplutekṣaṇais tai rājapuruṣair adhiṣṭhitāḥ suvarṇavarṇaṃ nagarān niṣkrāmayitum ārabdhāḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:605: [41] tañ ca nagarān niṣkāsyamānam ālokyānekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi
XXsuvrnavu:606: ekaraveṇoccair vikroṣṭum ārabdhāni hā kaṣṭam eṣa |
XXsuvrnavu:615: amī divākarasya sārthavāhasya mūrtimantaḥ prāṇā apahriyante |
XXsuvrnavu:616: hā kaṣṭaṃ kathaṃ nāma kumāro 'ṭavyām evaṃ paribhrāmya niṣkāsito na kenacid asya paritrāṇaṃ kṛtaṃ |
XXsuvrnavu:617: eṣa sāmprataṃ rājagṛhān nagarāc candramā mṛtyurāhuṇā grasyate |
XXsuvrnavu:619: etad rājagṛhanagaranivāsināṃ paurāṇāṃ netrāmṛtam adarśanapathe vyavasthāpyate |
XXsuvrnavu:623: eṣa rājagṛhanagaranivāsināṃ paurāṇāṃ hṛdayavallabho vināśāya nīyate |
XXsuvrnavu:624: kam idānīṃ rājagṛhanivāsinaḥ paurā animiṣam avalokayiṣyanti |
XXsuvrnavu:625: kam idānīṃ dṛṣṭvā prītimanaso bhaviṣyantīti nirāśībhūtāḥ ||
XXsuvrnavu:628: niḥkāsitaḥ suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāro rājagṛhān nagarād iti |
XXsuvrnavu:630: tatas te paurikā vyavahāriṇas tac chrutvā nirāśībhūtās tair āgatya teṣāṃ paurāṇām etat prakaraṇaṃ vistareṇāveditaṃ |
XXsuvrnavu:635: kalirājena tādṛśaḥ pitā dhārmiko dharmarājā jīvitād vyavaropitaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:636: idānīm ārabdha evaṃvidhān api prakhyātaguṇān mahājanavallabhān puruṣaviśeṣān asaṃdṛśyān praghātayituṃ
XXsuvrnavu:639: 'viśeṣajñatā mantriṇāṃ yo nāmaivam atyantarūpaudāryasampannatvāc ca vinītatvāc ca pūjām arhati sa eva guṇavān puruṣaviśeṣaḥ katham avicārya badhāya parityajyate |
XXsuvrnavu:640: athavā kāla evāyam īdṛśaḥ samupasthito yad asanto vivarddhante |
XXsuvrnavu:642: kālopakarṣya daurātmyam udbhāvayanto divākarasya sārthavāhasya etat prakaraṇaṃ vistareṇākhyātavantaḥ
XXsuvrnavu:644: [43] tac chrutvā vihatāśo divākaraḥ sārthavāhas tīvra śokaduḥkhābhyāhato mūrcchito bhūmau patitaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:645: tato jalapariṣekapratyāgataprāṇo viṣaṇṇamanā nirānandaḥ sāṃprataṃ putrako me praghātyata iti
XXsuvrnavu:647: locanānanda hā putra hā me kulavibhūṣaṇa |
XXsuvrnavu:649: vimuhyate me hṛdayaṃ bhramanti ca diśo 'dhunā |
XXsuvrnavu:652: hā kathaṃ dāruṇaṃ tāta tava vyasanam āgataṃ |3|
XXsuvrnavu:656: yair evaṃ vinayopetas tvaṃ putra na vicāritaḥ |5|
XXsuvrnavu:659: viśeṣo dhik sādhujano nūnam astaṅgato hṛdi |
XXsuvrnavu:660: guṇavān api yat putra nirākrandaḥ praghātyase |7|
XXsuvrnavu:661: tat kiṃ viproṣitāḥ sarvā nagarasyāsya devatāḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:662: ghātyamānam upekṣante yad evaṃ guṇinaṃ janaṃ |8|
XXsuvrnavu:663: sendrāḥ salokapālāś ca devā ye ca maharddhikāḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:664: anukampām upādāya te me rakṣantu putrakaṃ |9|
XXsuvrnavu:666: te 'nukampāṃ puraskṛtya parirakṣantu me sutam iti |10|
XXsuvrnavu:668: [44] tasya buddhir utpannā kim artham ahaṃ viṣīdāmi yan nv ahaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ sakalajagad ekabāndhavaṃ mahākāruṇikaṃ samunasmareyaṃ sa hi bhagavān anāthānān nāthaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:672: tathā hi tena bhagavatā kṛcchrasaṅkaṭasambādhaprāptā bahavaḥ sattvās tebhyas tebhyo mahābhayebhyaḥ parimocitā |
XXsuvrnavu:673: tathā mahāsamudram adhyagatā vaṇijo makarasya bhayasantrastāḥ samanusmaraṇamātreṇaiva tasmān maraṇabhayāt paritrātāḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:674: tathā naika puruṣaghātakenaikarabhasenodyataśastreṇāṅgulīmālena ghātyamānā tajjananī tasmāj jīvitopacchedabhayāt paritrātā |
XXsuvrnavu:675: tathā ca pūrvajanmavairānubanndhasāmarthyād anekaprāṇiśatasahastropaghātatham abhiprajvālitakrūrahutāśanasya mānuṣamāṃsarasāsvādalobhāt śravallālāvalelihāna_jihvā_vikaṭadīrghatīkṣṇadaṃṣṭrākarālabhīṣaṇamukhasya
XXsuvrnavu:676: yakṣasyāhārārtham upanāmitas tadvadvanasamīpastho hastaka āṭavakas tasmān maraṇabhayāt paritrātā || samarthaḥ sa bhagavān me putram asmāt saṅkaṭāt parimocayituṃ |
XXsuvrnavu:677: yan nv ahaṃ tam eva bhagavantaṃ mahākaruṇikaṃ parmavatsalasvabhāvaṃ samanusmareyam iti |
XXsuvrnavu:678: samīpastham anyatam upāsakaṃ pṛṣṭavān idānīṃ bhagavān kutra viharatīti |
XXsuvrnavu:679: tato 'sav upāsako bhagavantam anusmṛtya bāṣpoparudhyamānagadgadakaṇṭham uvāca |
XXsuvrnavu:680: sārthavāhaḥ yaḥ sārthavāho lokasya yo loke sukhadāyakaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:683: nirvṛtaḥ sa jino loke dīpaḥ snehakṣayād iti |2|
XXsuvrnavu:685: [45] tac chrutvā divākaraḥ sārthavāho bhagavadviyogād dviguṇīkṛtaśokaśalyābhyāhato mūrcchito bhūmau nipapāta |
XXsuvrnavu:686: tato jalapariṣekapratyāgataprāṇa utthāya yasyāṃ diśi bhagavān parinirvṛtas tadabhimukho uccair vikroṣṭum ārabdhaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:694: anāthaḥ khalv ayaṃ lokaḥ kaṃ nāthaṃ saṃśrayiṣyati |4|
XXsuvrnavu:695: ye ca te dharmato jātā vineyajanaputrakāḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:696: tvayā vihīnās te sarve kariṣyanti kam āśrayaṃ |5|
XXsuvrnavu:698: vihatāśaṃ janaṃ kṛtvā kām āśāṃ tvaṃ gato mune |6|

XXsuvrnavu:793: tvarita mabhigamyāsmadvacanāt suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāraṃ ghātyamānaṃ pratimocayati tasyāhaṃ suvarṇapeṭakamanu prayacchāmi pañca ca grāmavarāṇi|

XXsuvrnavu:815: saṃsāra doṣodvigno mokṣamārggābhilāṣī nirānandamātmānamavagamya param abhayaviṣāda vihvalekṣaṇo vikroṣṭum ārabdhaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:816: hā kaṣṭam idānīṃ mayā sudurllabhaṃ saddharmamahotsavaṃ manuṣyatvam āsādyākṛtārthe naiva marttavyam bhaviṣyatīti |

XXsuvrnavu:938: sandhyābbhrapaṭalāvaruddha iva bhāskaraḥ sakalabhuvanalakṣmīpuñja iva dedīpyamānamūrttiḥ svatejasā sūryaprabhān nirbhartsayaṃś pañcārhacchataparivāraḥ samanuprāpto gagatalastha eva suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāram āmantrayām āsa |

XXsuvrnavu:949: atha suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāro vaṇig iva labdhalābhaḥ sasyasampanna iva karṣakaḥ |

XXsuvrnavu:2048: [125] tato divākaraḥ sārthavāha uthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthibyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena sthavirānandas tenāñjalīṃ praṇamya trir udānam udānayatīdaṃ bhadantāsmākaṃ na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa pūrvapretena śravaṇabrāhmaṇair yad ānandenāsmākaṃ kṛtaṃ pracchoṣitā rudhirāśrusamudrā iti ||
XXsuvrnavu:2050: bhavasahasrasudurlabhaṃ darśana saphalam adya munes tava darśanaṃ |1| ity Sva Roy 346,3 -
XXsuvrnavu:2051: [126] atha sthavirānandas tāṃ sarājikāṃ parṣadaṃ dharmyayā kathayā sandarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃgraharṣya tair devatāśatasahasrair anekaiś ca rājagṛhavāsibhiḥ prāṇiśatasahasrair namasyamāna utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ |
XXsuvrnavu:2052: evam alpam api bhagavati buddhe kṛtam analpaphalam bhavatīti |
XXsuvrnavu:2054: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ (6) teṣān tathāgato hy avadat |
XXsuvrnavu:2055: teṣāñ ca yo nirodha evamvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ |1|
XXsuvrnavu:2056: [127] deyadharmo 'yaṃ pravaramahāyānayāyinaḥ śākyabhikṣubuddhākaraguptasya yad atra puṇyan tad bhavatv ācāryopādhyāyamātāpitṛpūrvaṅgamaṃ kṛtvā sakalasattvarāśer anuttarajñānaphalavāptaya iti ||
